text.div:
LowerBoundTypeVS ValueSet

Indicates the actual value is gt (>) or gte (>=) the given value.

name: LowerBoundTypeVS
title: LowerBoundTypeVS
publisher: HL7 Patient Care WG and Community-Based Care and Privacy WG
description: Indicates the actual value is gt (>) or gte (>=) the given value.

concept.display: The actual value is greater than the given value.
The actual value is greater than or equal to the given value.
